page.title: 01S.E. HUDDERSFIELD: Overview
page.content: The survey area comprises a 4km x 3km block east of{Huddersfield}town centre. Going from West to East of our block, the suburbs of Huddersfield give way to a more rural landscape. There are four major built-up areas from which most of the material has been gathered.{Ravensknowle/Dalton}is closest to Huddersfield centre. It includes Ravensknowle Museum and Park, council houses and Victorian terraces. {Dalton/Waterloo}has housing, light industry, a shopping centre and industrial complex.{Almondbury pre-dates the lO86 survey, but the modern village is a mixture of private housing, council houses and historic buildings. {Lepton}forms a triangle between the A629 and A642, and has a shopping centre, private and council houses, two churches and three schools.
